name: adc_gtm_rule_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getGTMRuleList():
    '''
    to get the list of GTM rule

    '''

    gtm_rule_list = []
    adc_gtm_rule_list = connect_db.appviewx.gr.find()
    for device in adc_gtm_rule_list:
        gtm_rule_list.append(device)
    return gtm_rule_list
description: To get a list of GTM rule
_keywords: To get a list of GTM rule
